title: The Art of Note-Taking: Beyond Transcription

content.title: Notes as an Extension of Mind
contents: Note-taking isn't about repeating what the lecturer said; it's about processing information. Effective notes are highly personalâ€”they represent your unique understanding and the connections you've made.
When you write something down in your own words, you are performing a mini-act of creation.

content.title: Techniques for Success
contents: Whether you use the Cornell method, mind mapping, or digital outlines, the goal remains the same: clarity and retrievability.
Your notes are your personalized knowledge database.
